A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
If you haven't seen this movie\, and you're a big fan of the original trilogy\, do yourself a favor and avoid this movie like the plague.

My two biggest complaints about this movie are:

1: The director and producer shoved their feminist ideology at the audience hard in this movie. All of the Resistance women were portrayed as smarter\, wiser\, or more kind than any man in the movie\, while there wasn't a single man in the movie that wasn't presented in some sort of negative fashion. There are no men portrayed in a positive fashion in this movie.

2: In their effort to push their feminist ideology they completely dumped all over the character and legacy of Luke Skywalker. At one point Mark Hamill said it felt like he was playing a completely different character. After watching this train wreck I can say\, he's right. He's not the Luke I grew up with.

Save your money and avoid this abomination. It is so bad that I will not watch Episode 9.
